name: HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee (HGNC)
description: The HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee (HGNC) database provides open access to HGNC-approved unique symbols and names for human genes, gene groups, and associated resources, including links to genomic, proteomic and phenotypic information.
full_citation: Seal RL, Braschi B, Gray K, Jones TEM, Tweedie S, Haim-Vilmovsky L, Bruford EA. Genenames.org: the HGNC resources in 2023. Nucleic Acids Res. 2023 Jan 6;51(D1):D1003-D1009. doi: 10.1093/nar/gkac888. PMID: 36243972; PMCID: PMC9825485.
